replies.body: I love souls too!

Ahri and Morde ship now?

That'd basically just be a competition of "Who gets to be the soul-bound slave first".

Sounds like a very kinky BDSM scenario.

...
Brb, writing some fanfiction.
And then Sona walks in on them... and turns out to be secretly an M.
Sona's actually an S.
post it here for the world to see
nah i think morde and thresh do a similar thing, where ahri just absorbs them and used them as a sort of "fuel"
Who doesn't?
{{champion:98}} They get annoying after a while. Especially when I have to fight armies of them. The nerve of those guys...
How dare they!

She likes souls? Well then...
http://orig10.deviantart.net/beb9/f/2013/242/b/2/shy_thresh_by_lefreaks-d6kadni.gif
{{champion:412}}: So... how you doin :)

Well. . . funny you'd say that cause. . .
http://49.media.tumblr.com/a210aba0ba2717a1c9585cb9d6d441c2/tumblr_napzrfwGVv1r5zq6ao5_500.gif

{{champion:103}} now waits in line with {{champion:412}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:45}} and. . . {{champion:17}} 

{{champion:103}} "You too?"
{{champion:17}} "They don't call me Satan for nothing."
{{champion:45}} "The Master of Evil does not need to wait in line. He should be at the front!"
{{champion:82}} "Oh shut up, you little rodent."
Oh... So not me. Just checking.
u don't have a soul?
I don't. I already gave her mine.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
It's okay. I knew what I was doing~ I don't mind.
did she just take it and leave? or did you get something in return? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
She took it and left. To be fair I did say she could have it. She at least said "thank you"

At least she's a polite Soul stealer.

Then there's Morde who rips your soul out of your body and Thresh who tortures you...

I guess you could say she's ClASSy

....

I'm sorry...

Sorry i don't trust you to make puns. 

(yep that was weak too)
You tried your luck.
{{champion:412}} Stop stealing my god damn armor, what are you going to do with 0.75 more ap
